title: Anyone getting higher ping than normal?
body: I used to get 53 ping in game, but now it is at 70. Can anyone list some possibilities as to why this might be happening. I have checked task manager and have closed background tasks. Please help {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Mine has been  doing that every night around  the same time. Usually have 30 and then go to 70 it's honestly really noticeable.

Ow, that's a decent sudden change.  Could be a variety of factors here like how your ISP is routing or even a change in local network settings or stability.  Try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help take care of those factors, and test it in a custom game.  I hope that helps!
